p: The PL lifetimes of Bi-doped Cs 2SnCl 6 and Mn-doped CsPbCl 3 were measured using TRPL. As shown in Fig. 2a, the decay curve of Bi-doped Cs 2SnCl 6 is fitted well by an exponential function and the lifetime is 375 ns, which is in good accordance with the previous report [ 33]. As for Mn-doped CsPbCl 3 QDs, the lifetime is longer (1.7 ms), which supports that it originates from the spin-forbidden ligand field transition of the Mn 2+ ions [ 32].
